enhanced_description: Sarvika Technologies Private Limited, founded in 2013, is a comprehensive software solutions provider focused on helping businesses digitize traditional processes. While offering a broad range of IT services including E-commerce solutions, Database Administration, Quality Assurance Engineering, Application Development, Off-Shore Consulting, and Website Art, Sarvika Technologies also specializes in HR technology solutions. Their HR forte encompasses Talent Management and Recruiting categories, specifically delivering HR management suites, Talent management software, Onboarding software, and Video interviewing software. The company builds custom IT solutions for clients at all levels of growth, from assisting startups in designing IT processes to modernizing and developing custom solutions for enterprises. Sarvika Technologies serves a global clientele, with a primary presence in North America, and is backed by a team of over 100 tech professionals utilizing a robust tech stack, including Java and Golang.
